channel.title: Samad's RSS Feed
channel.description: Just a few articles I find interesting that you might as well!

item.title: Who needs Facebook friends when there's Kirobo? - CNET
item.description: Facebook continues its quest to become a community classifieds section with the mobile Marketplace. But nothing you'll find for sale will ever be as cool as Toyota's Kirobo Mini.

item.title: NASA Awards Contract for Information Technology Support Services
item.description: NASA has awarded its Goddard Information Technology Integration Support Services (GITISS) contract to Business Integra, Inc. of Bethesda, Maryland.

item.title: NASA, China to Collaborate on Air Traffic Management Research
item.description: NASA and the Chinese Aeronautical Establishment (CAE) have signed a memorandum of understanding to cooperate on aeronautics research that will advance air transportation automation for U.S. and Chinese aviation operations in China.

item.title: Primatologist Frans de Waal weighs in on Harambe
item.description: Where does our sense of right and wrong come from?

item.title: Everything Dies, Right? But Does Everything Have To Die? Here's A Surprise
item.description:
A puzzlement.

Why, I wonder, are both these things true?
